website_summaries.verdict: A rugged lantern that has a nice look and puts out a lot of light.
pros: Lantern has an oil-rubbed bronze finish with clear seeded glass
Comes with instructions and mounting hardware
A quality light made of heavy, thick metal
cons: A few purchasers say this lantern does not hang straight

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, great price. Not oil rubbed bronze, just black.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking basic light fixture. I bought these to replace expensive LED fixtures with built in power supplies. Two out of four failed and can't be fixed. Don't buy those! I installed dusk-to-dawn bulbs in these and they work great for less than half the LED units, and you can actually change the bulbs in these, like at Halloween or Christmas when I like to put colored lights up. My only gripe is that these are NOT oil rubbed bronze, even though that's what the box says. They are just straight black with no texturing. And they are smaller than I expected. I took a picture next to my old dusty broken LED pieces of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Hugemonster

customer_reviews.title: Westinghouse lamps
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 for our new patio columns. Cannot beat this price, 1/2 if not 1/3 of the price of similar from big box stores. Looks gorgeous and high quality. Love the little bubbles in the glass. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for high end looking outdoor lights without the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was not good. All boxes were opened and parts were fallen ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these lights. Each light was missing some parts. Packaging was not good. All boxes were opened and parts were fallen out. All in all managed to fix them all. However I'll give four stars for finished of the product. E26 holder worked well with E27 light bulb. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rasika

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Looks Great, Very Bright, Nice Design. Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I needed 5 of the lights without a bottom. As the bug seemed to collect in previous light fixtures. Works perfect for my needs. Well Made, Looks Great, Very Bright, Nice Design. Excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Forget Lowe's, have this delivered to your doorstep
customer_reviews.text: I am officially delighted with my purchase of this outdoor light. It's metal, heavier than I expected, feels study and of good quality. It looks way better in person than the picture...and the pictures looks nice. My boyfriend hung it for me in about 15 minutes after getting out of box; it's pretty and works great, no problems. I particularly liked that it takes up to 100 watt bulb, whereas most 'affordable' fixtures seem to support 60 watt, and another big plus is that the bottom is open so you don't have to disassemble anything to simply change the bulb. Happy girl :0)
customer_reviews.author: Cris in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to check the light when you get it out of the package!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lamps are great but one of the two arrived without a screw that keeps the glass cover on. I already mounted it, wired and caulked it, so I'm not up for pulling it all out to send it back, but worth noting that you should completely check the lamp before wiring it up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased seven of these for a house we were building. Three years later, every single one of them is rusty. Some have just a bit of rust. Others have LOTS of rust. Unless you plan on changing these out every few years, my suggestion is to not be tempted by the cheap price, and instead buy something else. You've been warned...
customer_reviews.author: SoCalScott

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if the lights will be exposed to weather
customer_reviews.text: We've had these lights for only 3 years now and although they looked really nice initially, they are not holding up well. If they are under an overhang outside, they are okay, but if they are at all exposed to light and rain, they fade and rust terribly. Even the ones that only get minimal light and rain have some fading and rusting. They are a decent price and easy to install, so if you have them in a side area or under an overhang, I think you'll be fine. But if you have them in an open space, I would definitely not recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is good for product.
customer_reviews.text: Pros Light is nice looking. Bulbs are easy to reach in and install Quality is good per price. Cons No directions if needed. Mounting on a flat surface will not work unless creative. Bulb screws in hard as the threads are not quite right. The fixture was not centered with hanger. Had to bend it slightly. In the end it's a nice looking light for the money. I had just a flat wall with a drilled hole for wires. Not sure what a normal light fixture mounting area is like but I had to bend bracket and cut down the bolts that hold the main fixture in order for this to fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: EXP10

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Lowe's has very few brushed bronze, outdoor light fixtures. And none that I liked. So I ordered these. Oddly, the 2 pack at the time I ordered, was more expensive than ordering 2 individual ones. Very pleased. Pretty simple install. Needed to seal the lamps with silicone where they attached to the wall to keep water at from the wires. No big deal if you're somewhat handy.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, well made. Not motion detector equipped, not listed nor required as such.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, well made, sturdy. We live by the ocean on the west coast, a corrosive environment. So I cleaned and painted them with several coats of Rustoleum 2X Ultra Cover Clearcoat to prevent corrosion. They turned out shiny and a bit darker black. They should live a bit longer in our environment! The installation was easy, all parts and excellent mounting hardware were included in the box. They look great on our front and back porch and garage. I installed 75 watt LED bulbs, very clear light all the way to the street and back yard! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Not colorfast! They do NOT stay pretty
customer_reviews.text: First. I hate black. It isn't pretty and I especially do not like matte. These WERE bronze and now after less than a year, they're MATTE BLACK. Complete rubbish. So pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Dana A.

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy with installation
customer_reviews.text: Lantern looks to be well made. Finish is nice. An attractive design, which goes well with a colonial style house. It should be easy to install but the mounting holes on the lantern did not line up with the existing outlet box adaptor, which worked with the previous fixture. So I had to use the included hardware which did not fit with my outlet box and I had to hacksaw the heads off the mounting screws to make it fit securely. I spent probably 3 hours removing existing hardware and installing two new lanterns in freezing temperatures. The lantern is also a bit smaller than I would have preferred. I am satisfied but not over-joyed.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Made to Stand Up Against Hail
customer_reviews.text: We bought these lights to replace the ones on our house that were damaged by hail two years ago. This summer has also been a bad hail season and these lights have withstood golf ball size hail without any damage. Not only do the lights look great, they are well made. The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Deepthinker

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I needed and ordered 4 of these lights and thought I could trust the Westinghouse brand. There were other lights in other brands that I'd never heard of. Two of the 4 lights that I received had noticeable flaws. On one, there were so many bubbles in the seeded glass that it was no longer clear, it was foggy; and looked different from the other three lights. Another light had a big flaw in a glass panel and a loose glass panel that was not sealed to the frame like the others. Quality control is a rather big issue with these.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Love our new light fixture! It was easy to install. Some people mentioned problems with installation. Note, the screws are not too long. There is a ball end on them that snugs up the screws. If you do not notice this, you may think the screws are too long,we did at first. Just be sure to measure so that you are sure the base will fit the area where you plan to install the light. We replaced a super cheap jar-type light on the front of the house with this one and it looks fantastic. I intend to buy 2 more to replace the other lights on my house. Love it. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Light matches outdoor lighting already in place. It was a little bigger than I wanted, but am perfectly happy with the product. It was easy to install if you know what you are doing. It has held up well outside and still looks brand new. It is a little difficult to clean the glass on the inside, but that is not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S.

customer_reviews.title: Base is oval not round. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the lights look great, but the base that attaches to the wall is oval and too long to fit on j block for vinyl siding. The pictures make it look round in some and oval in others. The description tells you too of light to center of mounting, but the arm of the light on top goes above the base. I wouldn’t have ordered if I had known. I hope I can return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymester

customer_reviews.title: Glass shield allows effective illumination of a wide area
customer_reviews.text: Nice exterior light. No bottom surface so bugs don't collect. I don't know why Amazon asks about motion sensitivity since it is not motion sensitive. I recommend combining it with an LED bulb with a light sensor so you can switch it on and it will come on when it is dark outside and switch itself off when it gets bright out.
customer_reviews.author: Sparx

customer_reviews.title: It IS as nice-looking as the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I forgot to review this light - I love it! We spent MONTHS looking for a front porch light, and this was one we could both agree matched the style of our house and also could agree that we liked the overall look/style of it. We are very happy with it and it has stood up well to the elements. It's been up for at least 4 years now, maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: SusanC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar light to this one with a motion detector on my side porch. I was looking for something like it to upgrade my front porch and was so pleased to find this one. It's large and impressive looking and the finish is beautiful. I love the seeded glass - it looks like raindrops. The light was easy to install, my husband was able to get it done in about half and hour. Very happy with the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Allyse W. Lande

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Exterior Light
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to replace an old exterior light installed on the wall of the enclosed porch in front of my home. The difficulty was that junction box behind the mounting position was too deep for easy mounting and I had to improvise to get this new light fixture attached. Now that it is attached and working it looks good and provides all of the light needed in that area of the home entrance.
customer_reviews.author: Loren E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Black Not Bronze!
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed when I received. These are black not bronze. My husband installed before I saw them and we had to remove and paint to make them match our other fixtures. Would have given a higher rating if I had wanted and received black.
customer_reviews.author: Shellys Mom

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Completely rusty. Do not purchase. Only comes with a 30/ day warranty. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Used retro looking LED bulbs and looks very nice. I like that you do not have to ...
customer_reviews.text: reasonable quality similar to a Lowe's or Home Depot product. Used retro looking LED bulbs and looks very nice. I like that you do not have to take lamp apart to replace bulbs. Previous lamps 10+ years old looked great, but nut to hold glass shade on corroded and broke lamp trying to change bulb
customer_reviews.author: RichardB.

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased but check glass for cracks.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and like the ease of open bottom for changing bulb. The screws that came with it were too long so had to use different screws. Also, the first light fixture sent had a small crack in glass so had to exchange it but that process was easy. Overall pleased with this light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in these light fixtures
customer_reviews.text: These lights have been a big disappointment. The bolts provided to mount the light were too long, so the fixture couldn’t be mounted flush until we purchased bolts. When changing the lightbulb the entire light fixture turns. I would send them back, but they are installed.
customer_reviews.author: msms1987

customer_reviews.title: Highly  recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and added an upscale look to our country home . Bought two of them and installed them on our front porch 6x6 post. I put the old looking led bulb in them and it's a great look.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful finish and classy looking
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! I added a light sensor bulb that I bought from Amazon so that this light just turns on when it's dark out. Its a beautiful finish and classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: KalaniTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Classy Looking and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with these lights. I ordered three -- one on either side of the garage door and one for my back patio. Very solid and sturdy, and contrary to other comments, these are not black, but dark brown with bronze highlights. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my back patio. After having my house painted I wanted to put new lights up. These look great for the price.I like that they are open at the bottom which makes changing the bulb so easy. Also has enough space inside to add an adapter so that you can plug in another cord and still have a bulb in the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great aesthetics!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy for my husband to install. We like the aesthetics and it is functional as well. It seems like good quality. It has been out for a couple of months and still looks brand new which I would expect for any decent light fixture. It is a substantial size which we like. I will be buying more for the front of the house. The price is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I am so glad that we upgraded to these. We’ve gotten so many compliments. I searched near and far for dusk to dawn or motion lights and couldn’t find any I loved so I settled on these and purchased dusk to dawn light bulbs. Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: mamaduck

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 7 Westinghouse Lighting 6230600 fixtures for my home. Within weeks of installing them the screws rusted on everyone one of them. They look terrible (see image) and I need to replace them. I would like my purchase refunded, but I do not want to go through the hassle of returning all 7 of them.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: We have them on each side of our garage.We did have to saw off the screws to make them shorter but they are beautiful! We have gotten so many compliments on them from our neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking installed easy above door. Gets harsh rain and wind there since september 17 and still going. Have a motion sensor bulb in one so light omes on when opening door. Sweet
customer_reviews.author: YLM

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, one for each side of garage door. They are beautiful and go just perfect with our home. Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Barry W. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great light but oil rubbed bronze is more of a black
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because I love the light but I ordered the oil rubbed bronze and it looks black; unfort I had someone install when I wasn’t home so I guess I’m keeping them. But def disappointed in the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and simple to install where an existing light was.. I especially like that the bulb installs from the bottom rather that having to unscrew tiny nuts that I always seem to loose that hold down the lid on some lights!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: These light figures are 1/3 of the price of comparable fixtures at major stores, but they look great and seem to be pretty well made. The mounting bolts are about 1/4-1/2 inch too long, so you’ll need to cut them or go buy shorter bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Criselda Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good looking light. I like that it’s open at the bottom so bugs don’t get in and die, then eventually fill half way up with dead bugs. The glass is a bit bubbly, like a hand blown look. Looks nice and though is light weight, seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We love the new look these lights add to our home. The light washes down and out which looks great at night and provides a great deal of light.
customer_reviews.author: Hopservation

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can change the bulb very easily from the bottom. Nice looking light, easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stylish Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of them. They are stylish. Work well outside and look beautiful. I put 2 bright LED corn bulbs and the lantern does not attenuate light like other lanterns do.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: A must BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light fixture, added the perfect touch to my porch!
customer_reviews.author: denice williamson

customer_reviews.title: Both were definitely not bronze, but black.
customer_reviews.text: These light fixtures were order as bronze, it said bronze on both fixture boxes, but they were definitely black. Not even a hint of bronze. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: tileman

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great outside lamp for a great price! I get quite a few comments about what a nice lamp this is. I also get the question of how much did you pay? People are shocked when I tell them. They think it's a designer type of lamp. I think the bubble type of glass makes people think I went to a lighting store to get such a cute lamp. Can't go wrong for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ashct04

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: We attached ours to a manufactured home and it was a little more difficult than it would have been it we had attached it to a stick built home. We are pleased with the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Rice

customer_reviews.title: great lights
customer_reviews.text: loved the product--customer service does not at Westinghouse. no one returned calls or emails.
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: We can now easily change to different color bulbs for different seasons or ...
customer_reviews.text: we replaced the three (much larger) fixtures that came with our new home. The original fixtures came with three 60 watt candelabra style bulbs per fixture, we replaced that with a smaller, neater but with very similar design. We can now easily change to different color bulbs for different seasons or occasions. Very reasonable price via Amazon. Would recommend this fixture, and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lights
customer_reviews.text: We replaced 4 outside lights with these lights and we were happy with the look and the ease to install. These lights looked like the picture so we were happy with them. We used LED bulbs and they throw off plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Penkala

customer_reviews.title: These lamps were amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were amazing for the price! We would've spent 3 or 4x the amount at a box store. Easy to install, and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: ~JeskaJoy~

customer_reviews.title: Very classy with easy installation...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty light fixture...produces a nice warm light that was a major upgrade from my old porch light. Very simple to install took no more than 10 minutes to install and that included taking the old fixture off.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Parker

customer_reviews.title: ... for the back of my house and they are great. Much cheaper than the alternatives available locally from ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for the back of my house and they are great. Much cheaper than the alternatives available locally from "Big Blue" and "Big Orange", and of superior quality. They were really well packed being completely surrounded in formed Styrofoam to protect the glass and the fixture. Installed quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dobie

customer_reviews.title: Great style, great size.
customer_reviews.text: This looks really great on my house and for the price is a real statement piece. It's bigger than I expected and I like that!
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty light fixture. Open on the bottom, making it easy to replace bulbs. Easily installed, my husband installed two in less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Harris

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and built sturdy. I like that I can change the bulb from below without having to remove any parts. Also since there is no bottom, dead bugs won't collect there.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised how nice these look!
customer_reviews.text: All the houses in this "planned community" have exactly the same porch lights. That's something you might not notice but if you want to make your house stand out, spruce up the outside a little. Making the entryway look nice will impress future buyers. You can't beat the price. And it's easy to change the light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: lacoursl

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was exactly what I was looking for!! I needed some lights in the backyard and it fits the bill perfectly!!! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ironman&Ultrarunner

customer_reviews.title: these lights covers made my house look great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of these lights. They don't look to be made cheap and will last a long time. I will update if this review if I have any problems. recommend buying if your looking at them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H.

customer_reviews.title: Niiccee
customer_reviews.text: I got these working 4 stars. They have good material 4 stars. Beautiful 4 stars. The nuts for the screws suck 1 Star. (easy fix)
customer_reviews.author: justinchenault

customer_reviews.title: I really like this front porch lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really like this front porch lamp. It looks just as I expected. I would refer to any one of my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Its so beautiful. So glad I got it. It lights up my side entrance.
customer_reviews.author: carol a coad

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to install by the garage, we liked them so much we added more on the side and back of the house. They add charm. :) (edison bulbs)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Off center appearance
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the lanterns moulding to the "hook" was off center and gave a crooked appearance when mounted. Beautiful lanterns otherwise. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Charmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Outdoor Light
customer_reviews.text: The instalation was easy and the product was as described. We really needed a light on the side of our home that was not motion triggered, because they all seem to not always be reliable. I installed it withing 10 to 15 minutes and it looks great. Now I just need to order another one for the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Installed two of these on exterior of garage. Nice finish, dark oil rubbed appearance. Prettt thin metal construction, not particularly heavy. Very simple installation. Kit includes all components and everything needed To install on existing box.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light. My son whom is an electrician hung no problem. Love it
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design for this front porch light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design for this front porch light. I replaced a horrible-looking, rusty rickety light with this one and it transformed the look of my front porch. It is beautiful and well made,.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo Playing with Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: No problem to install and very attractive. In my opinion, this is ideal for a smaller door/porch area.
customer_reviews.author: lvsknybbs

customer_reviews.title: Even though part of my order was back ordered, ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though part of my order was back ordered, when all finally came it makes a huge improvement in apearance to my house. I installed two in front of my garage, one by my front door and one at the rear. I use clear 100 watt light bulbs .he ones that I replaced did not match (one in rear was different) and only allowed the use of 60 watt bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Henry & Yulia Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice fixture that really improved the look of my back entrance. It's classy & was a great replacement for the generic light that formally lit my patio. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terri D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, we’ll made and takes light bulbs that are easy to change!
customer_reviews.author: sbenedikt6145

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Light Fixture
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this light fixture is great. It looks more expensive than it is. Time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: ETexNana

customer_reviews.title: Very good, nice style.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice style, it was easy and simple to install. I use it on my back yard patio, it adds charm.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love the bubbled glass
customer_reviews.text: Lovely light! Love the bubbled glass. Nice update to property I'm preparing to sell--matches the black house numbers, black wrought iron railing, and flower planters. EXCELLENT PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Lit up my night...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't find anything close to this quality and size. Takes a 100w light bulb too. Easy to install. Well packed and all parts were present. If it looks a bit crooked out of the box you can easily line it back up, one of the joints on top will move a bit when forced.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Charming fixture
customer_reviews.text: The light fixture is charming. Beautiful bronze finish with beautiful seeded glass. Looks spectacular on my new Pacific Blue siding. Adds a touch of class. Different from so many other porch lights I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Judi R.

customer_reviews.title: Read me on their longevity
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in July of 2015. They started to rust in 2018 and fall apart. I will be replacing both this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Warren IV

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this fixture. Looks great and looks expensive. Good value and best feature bottom is open and thus no opportunity for bugs to collect.
customer_reviews.author: Bronxgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fixture.
customer_reviews.text: This fixture seems of good quality. Wish the base was round to match the box. Had to silicone around the edge to get a good seal to keep the insects out of the gang box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: The light are nice... has a vintage look and I added the vintage bulbs with a little yellow huge. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: DVD's Plus

customer_reviews.title: Good valve, but smaller then it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but smaller then I thought it would be. Use for a smaller area. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Would rather install standard fixtures, then putting LEDs into them
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased two LED lights lasted 2 1/2 years and crapped out. Better off installing the regular fixtures and putting LED lights in them.You can also install light sensing LED lamps into them.
customer_reviews.author: Howard W

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! Easy to change the bulb and it won't collect bugs (my previous fixture faced up and I had to be sure the lid was secured or it filled up with bugs). The wavy glass is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great loughts
customer_reviews.text: These light are absolutely beautiful. Value pack is money well spent and worth it
customer_reviews.author: Cherie A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to reach in and change a simple light bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine and love that it is easy access to change out a bulb. We bought a pair of these to replace the Costco LED house coach lights with crackle glass, which I thoroughly loved until one stopped working and you cannot replace the LED part of it. Not doing that again. These are a bit smaller, and not at impressive as the Costco ones were, but they still work are were a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Smokyjose

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: I order five of these for the front of our house and garage. We had new siding put up and I wanted to replace the 30 year old lights.These lights were perfect and the price was the best I found anywhere. Five star product
customer_reviews.author: LORRAINE BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Tons of compliments. Updated most of my outdoor lighting to these.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: Light up your  home
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sprucing up the house to sell. Great lights for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lawana Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is large and well worth the money. Actually inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: JOY LYNN SHEPARD

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these light to replace older fixtures on the front of my 3-car garage and could not be more pleased. They were significantly cheaper than anything comparable at the big box stores. The bubble glass is very attractive. I like them so much, I am thinking about buying 2 more for my back patio.
customer_reviews.author: IrishEyes

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my front porch, but there is no motion detector
customer_reviews.author: chris ostopowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great light, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. No problems at all with quality or appearance. It is exactly as picture. I do wish I had gotten a fixture with 5 sides rather than 4 because of the appearance from the street. .
customer_reviews.author: TBAbby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the porch. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value and beautiful style
customer_reviews.text: We had some very fancy expensive coach lamps but they constantly burned bulbs out. The kicker was replacing the bulbs was a nightmare. We replaced the old ones with this pair and they are beautiful still fit with the colonial look of the house and changing a bulb is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyjae75

customer_reviews.title: A touch of class lovely lamps.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lamps and they are fabulous, perfect size sturdy and a touch of class on my property. Initially here was a hangup with my shipment but not at all the mistake of the seller, the delivery company messed up. I would by these again and definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: T. Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this lantern/light when I found it online and it looks just as beautiful in person. It was packaged very well to avoid breaking. Beautiful bronze finish. It really made a difference on the appearance of our house.
customer_reviews.author: Minnkota15

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: We added these to our home and took down some ugly brassy ones these look really nice on our cabin have bought 4 so far and will buy the rest to complete our home !
customer_reviews.author: ALLISON W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: Good lights. Think oval base is bigger than standard vinyl siding box but I did a work around. Would buy again as it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: north wis hunter

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 6230600 New Haven One-Light Exterior Wall Lantern on Steel with Clear Seeded Glass, Oil Rubbed Bronze Finish
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackAdd warm, welcoming light to the exterior of your home with the Westinghouse New Haven One-Light Wall Lantern. This traditional fixture adds distinguished style to outdoor settings with an oil rubbed bronze finish and clear seeded glass. Light up a front or back entryway with this lovely fixture. Install it on a porch or balcony for attention-grabbing illumination. Durable craftsmanship ensures lasting style and beauty, backed by a five-year limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship. Westinghouse is a trusted, global brand. Westinghouse knows lighting and offers products with exceptional quality, reliability and functionality. Product reference number 62306.
feature_bullets: One-light fixture is perfect for use in front or back entryways or on a porch
Outdoor rated fixture, oil rubbed bronze finish with clear seeded glass
Use one 100 watt maximum medium-base light bulb
Height 12-3/4 inches, Width 6-1/2 inches, Extends from wall 8-5/8 inches, Height from center of outlet box 4-7/8 inches, Back plate height 6-7/8 inches, Back plate width 4-1/2 inches
Includes installation instructions and mounting hardware, UL/CUL listed for safety. Approved Location:Indoor/Outdoor
